name: LhuLhu
description:
You play as Lhu-Lhu, bored as usual and carrying out her duties as a Creature of the Deep. Go throughout the vast beyond that is your home, space, and corrupt as many planets as you can. Beware, however, the obstacles created from the Unknown (black obstacles with spikes). You can destroy them with your spoopy tentacles, but if you destroy nearby planets, you lose your points.

Solo Project. Updates coming soon.

Design, Art, Programming and Sound by Chau Ho
